title: How to Make Chili Con Queso Dip

steps.headline: Place cheese cubes in the top of a double boiler over boiling water.
Stir in tomatoes and hot chili peppers.
Serve with tortilla or corn chips.

text: Place cheese cubes in the top of a double boiler over boiling water.  Stir constantly until cheese melts.  Stir in tomatoes and hot chili peppers.  Stir until blended and creamy.  Serve with tortilla or corn chips.  Makes 2 1/2 cups dip.
